sqlMap.select: select count(*) from sample_boards where board_deleted = 'N'

select * from ( select row_number() over (order by B.board_no desc) as rn, B.board_no as no, B.board_title as title, B.board_content as content, B.board_read_count as readCount, B.board_created_date as createdDate, U.user_id as "user.id", U.user_name as "user.name" from sample_boards B, sample_users U where B.board_deleted='N' and B.user_id = U.user_id) where rn between #begin# and #end#

select B.board_no as no, B.board_title as title, B.board_content as content, B.board_read_count as readCount, B.board_updated_date as updateDate, B.board_created_date as createdDate, B.board_deleted as deleted, U.user_id as "user.id", U.user_name as "user.name" from sample_boards B, sample_users U where B.board_no = #value# and B.user_id = U.user_id
sqlMap.insert: insert into sample_boards (board_no, board_title, board_content, user_id) values (board_seq.nextval, #title#, #content#, #user.id#)
sqlMap.update: update sample_boards set board_title = #title#, board_content = #content#, board_read_count = #readCount#, board_deleted = #deleted#, board_updated_date = sysdate where board_no = #no#
